item.title: 中国隆基将取代太阳能电池板中的银以降低成本

item.title: 奇货可居：美联储研究会议内幕（播客）
item.description: 每年，地区性联邦储备银行都会举办一些中央银行界最具实质性、最不为人所熟知的活动：研究会议。在正式论文和密集的宏观模型背后，美联储货币政策的大部分知识基础在这里开始形成。在本期节目中，我们将带您走进波士顿联储第 69 届年度经济会议，听听经济学家们究竟在争论什么，他们如何选择最重要的问题，以及【原文：Every year, regional Federal Reserve banks host some of the most substantive — and under-the-radar — events in the central banking world: research conferences. Behind the formal papers and dense macro models, this is where much of the Fed’s intellectual groundwork for monetary policy first starts to take shape. On this episode, we take you inside the Boston Fed’s 69th annual Economic Conference to hear what the economists are actually debating, how they choose the questions that matter most, and】
